L7p:Comment.stringValue: === If you have the need to customize this policy
=== please contact CA APIM Support so we can improve customization capability
This policy can be found and should be used as 'Encapsulated Assertion'!
This policy persists an oauth client

L7p:value.stringValue: will be overwritten in the case of an error
check for a valid persistence type

L7p:JdbcQuery.L7p:SqlQuery: INSERT INTO oauth_client (client_ident, name, description, organization, registered_by, type, created, custom) VALUES (${client_ident},${client_name},${description},${org},${registered_by},${type},${now.seconds},${client_custom})

INSERT INTO oauth_client_key (client_key, secret, scope, callback, environment, expiration, status, client_ident, created, created_by, client_name, custom, serviceIds, accountPlanMappingIds) VALUES (${client_key},${client_secret},${scope},${callback},${environment},${expiration},${client_status},${client_ident},${now.seconds},${registered_by},${client_name},${key_custom},${service_ids},${account_plan_mapping_ids})

L7p:value.stringValue: store a new client including a client_key

L7p:SqlQuery.stringValue: SELECT name FROM oauth_client WHERE client_ident = ${client_ident}

L7p:JdbcQuery.L7p:SqlQuery: INSERT INTO oauth_client_key (client_key, secret, scope, callback, environment, expiration, status, client_ident, created, created_by, client_name, custom, serviceIds, accountPlanMappingIds) VALUES (${client_key},${client_secret},${scope},${callback},${environment},${expiration},${client_status},${client_ident},${now.seconds},${registered_by},${jdbcQuery.client_name},${key_custom},${service_ids},${account_plan_mapping_ids})

INSERT INTO oauth_client (client_ident, name, description, organization, registered_by, type, created, custom) VALUES (${client_ident},${client_name},${description},${org},${registered_by},${type},${now.seconds},${client_custom})
